| HistoryText             = The Press Gang was a group of [[Homo superior|mutant]] enforcers working for the government of [[Genosha]].

The mutant residents on the island nation were enslaved by the law, and were genetically altered by the [[Genegineer]] into [[Genoshan Mutates]], devoid of free will. They performed any task needed from hard labor to soldiering.

The Press Gang was created to retrieve mutants who attempted leave and defect to other countries, as this action was not recognized by Genoshan law.

The Press Gang was an official branch of the Genoshan police force known as the [[Magistrates (Earth-616)|Magistrates]]. The squad consisted of three field operatives and one support operative. It was discovered by the X-Man, [[Alexander Summers (Earth-616)|Havok]], that they were actually mutants working voluntarily for the government, rather than enslaved Genoshan Mutates.{{Citation}}
